name: AMCMissionTracker
description: Air Mobility Command Mission Tracking Application for flight operations and crew management

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan mission documents and capture flight-related photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save and retrieve mission-related images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location services to calculate accurate flight distances and verify airport positions.
